LanguageData.UncompromisingFires_GuiIndicatorTooltip:
The map dries up over time after rainfall, increasing fire growth and spread on outdoor objects.
The rate at which the map dries up is heavily influenced by the map's temperature and tile average rainfall (general biome humidity).
LanguageData.UncompromisingFires_IndoorDryness: Indoor Fire Spread and Growth Rate
LanguageData.UncompromisingFires_MaxDryness: Maximum Outdoor Fire Spread and Growth Rate
LanguageData.UncompromisingFires_SettingsDescription: The map dries up over time after rainfall, increasing fire growth and spread on outdoor objects. The rate at which the map dries up is heavily influenced by the map's temperature and tile average rainfall (general biome humidity).
LanguageData.UncompromisingFires_EvaporationRateMulti: Predicted time for a map to fully dry out (will be longer on tiles with high rainfall):
